org.infiniquery.model

Class EntityAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.infiniquery.model.EntityAttribute

  • public class EntityAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
    Value object bean representing an attribute of a JPA entity.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Daniel Doboga

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityAttribute

        public EntityAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName,
                       java.lang.String displayName,
                       java.lang.String roles,
                       java.lang.String possibleValuesQuery,
                       java.lang.String possibleValueLabelAttribute,
                       java.lang.String possibleValueLabelAttributePath,
                       boolean displayOnly)
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the java attribute of the entity class
        displayName - the displayable alias
        roles - the roles, comma separated
        possibleValuesQuery - the query to retrieve the collection of possible values.
        possibleValueLabelAttribute - the object attribute to consider as label for representation of the objects retrieved by executing possibleValuesQuery
        possibleValueLabelAttributePath - the path within the object tree, deep to the possibleValuesLabelAttribute
        displayOnly - boolean flag dictating whether or not the attribute should be displayed only in the results, or also added as search filter.
